website_summaries.verdict: For those looking for a high-quality yet simple and straightforward cleanser for dry skin.
pros: This is an award-winning cleanser that removes makeup, dirt, and cleans out pores to reveal a more even skin tone
cons: Not recommended for oily or combination skin types

customer_reviews.title: Adequate replacement for Simple Micellar Cleansing Gel
customer_reviews.text: Its impossible to find Simple Micellar Cleansing Gel anymore, anywhere, my hands-down-favorite cleansing facial wash. I was reluctant to try this, Simple Moisturizing Facial Wash, but its starting to win me over. I've found you really need to work this into a lather with a little water before applying, but it seems to work pretty well to remove makeup. Does it work as well as the Micellar Cleansing Gel? Hard to tell. It may be a bit more moisturizing, though.
customer_reviews.author: Debb S.

customer_reviews.title: The best sensitive wash for just about anything in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my face from breaking out. Always leaves that clean feeling. Good for lady parts too as it is scent free. Have used it to wash cuts and burns too. Doesn't sting or leave me itchy no matter what I'm using it for. The cheapest option available for purchase I have found is the 4 pack from this vendor.

customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cleanser that leaves skin feeling clean and hydrated
customer_reviews.text: Skincare is so unique to each person. I found this item when searching for natural cleansers. It seems to be pretty pure. I have the typical slightly oil t-zone and dryer skin in harsh winters. This product works for this combination, for me. It lathers a little, feels creamy, cleans off make-up pretty well and has no fragrance or irritation. I do use an oil to remove mascara because it's easier then rubbing your eyes to get mascara off. This product provides a clean feeling and leaves skin feeling hydrated which is hard to find. It is not medicated so keep that in mind if you use those types of products.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

product_meta.title: Simple Moisturizing Facial Wash, 5 Ounce (4 Count)

Wash away impurities that lead to clogged pores and breakouts and enjoy skin that is soft, moisturized and replenished. Plus, Simple Face Wash is gentle enough for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
